description: The National Research Council Canada (NRC) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of two benchtop gas analyzers.
full_summary:
===============

### Tender Title
--------------

Two Benchtop Gas Analyzers

### Tender Reference Number
-------------------------

*   Reference Number: cb-420-50146800
*   Solicitation Number: 23-58111
*   Amendment Number: 9

### Notice Information
-----------------

*   **Publication Date**: October 3, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: November 3, 2023, 14:00:00 (local time)
*   **Amendment Date**: November 3, 2023

### Tender Details
-----------------

*   **Tender Type**: *Request for Proposal (RFP)*
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
*   The purchase is part of the National Research Council Canada (NRC) project to obtain two benchtop gas analyzers for a CO2 electrolysis system.
    *   The purchaser plans to utilize the analyzers to analyze the anode and cathode output gas streams.

### Procurement Information
------------------------

*   **Region of Opportunity**: British Columbia, Canada
*   **Contracting Entity**: National Research Council Canada
*   **Contracting Entity Address**: 4250 Wesbrook Mall, Vancouver, British Columbia V6T 1W5
*   **Contract Contact**: Kacendra Dion
    *   Phone: (438) 324-8125
    *   Email: <kacendra.dion@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca>

### Attachments
-------------

*   The tender, bid submission, and answers to the questions are attached to this notice.
*   Please download the attachments from the following link:  <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21208/23-58111_rfp_en_benchtop-gaz-analyzer_0.pdf>

### Note
---------

To respond to this RFP, please carefully review the Annexes and all related documents. Bidders must provide evidence of company qualifications and experience in the field. Only submissions in English or French will be accepted, so be sure to specify language preference.

### Important Dates
-----------------

*   **Tender Closing Date**: November 3, 2023
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 15, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: March 20, 2024

If you need more information about this tender, please contact Kacendra Dion at the above-mentioned email or
